title: Deploy New Software Version
description: A new version of the application has passed all tests and is ready to be deployed to production.

tasks.description: Verify that the build version in the CI/CD pipeline is the correct one and has a 'green' status.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the correct build is approved for deployment.

tasks.description: Initiate a canary deployment, releasing the new version to 5% of users.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully starts the canary release process.

tasks.description: Monitor error rates and performance metrics for the canary group for 30 minutes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent monitors dashboards and confirms no increase in errors.

tasks.description: Since the canary release is stable, proceed with a full rollout to all users.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully promotes the release to 100% of traffic.
